coreAttributes.authorTag: A small disclaimer on the label claims 'Buck's is a subsidiary of MintyChip Foods'
coreAttributes.name: Buck's Mix
coreAttributes.description: A small plastic bag, completely filled with granola, dried fruit, and nuts. On the label, there is a photo of a deer-morph eating the contents in a wooded area.

useDescriptions.selfUse: [npc.Name] [npc.verb(open)] the top of the plastic bag and [npc.verb(glance)] in at the assorted contents. Tilting [npc.her] head back, [npc.she] [npc.verb(pour)] the trail mix into [npc.her] awaiting mouth, and in a matter of moments [npc.has] completely devoured the entire bag.
useDescriptions.otherUse: [npc.Name] [npc.verb(open)] the top of the plastic bag and [npc.verb(hold)] it out to [npc2.name], allowing [npc.herHim] to [npc2.verb(glance)] in at the assorted contents. Tilting [npc2.her] head back, [npc.she] [npc.verb(pour)] the trail mix into [npc2.namePos] awaiting mouth to chew the crunchy food, and in a matter of moments [npc2.has] completely devoured the entire bag.
